fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI --> views --> events propagation.
3. Tap on the labels,the view or on the blue window.
4. You will get label "you clicked on a label/view/window" depending on where you tap.
5. Nothic the labels you get
 
h5.Actual Result:
1. The labels are cut off to the right

h5.Expected Result:
1. the labels should not cut off to the right.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: BaseUI > Views > Events Propogation; the labels we get on tapping the view or label are cutoff
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body: The width/height used is "auto". This is not supported in BB, please use Ti.UI.SIZE and Ti.UI.FILL
Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
